tooltip.palmon.empty_contract: Use it on your Pokemon to let it work for you!
tooltip.palmon.labor_contract:
Place it in a Working Station to let the Pokemon to work!
 Sneak and right-click to release the Pokemon from the contract.
tooltip.palmon.boost_frame: Place it above the machines to set the boost multiplier with
tooltip.palmon.working_station:
Place an Labor Contract in it and provide enough food,
 the Pokemon will work on the machine around it.
tooltip.palmon.production_machine:
Need a Working Station.
 Let Pokemon produce resources (material, fluid, power) depends on the surrounding blocks!
 Usually requires the Pokemon to have base stats higher than certain value.
tooltip.palmon.processing_station:
Need a Working Station.
 Let Pokemon use different resources (material, fluid, power) and the surrounding blocks to create new items/materials!
 Usually requires the Pokemon to have base stats higher than certain value.
text.palmon.contract_on_wild: You cannot hire a wild pokemon
text.palmon.contract_on_other: You cannot hire other player's pokemon
text.palmon.labor_contract_not_shift: You need to press [Shift] to release the pokemon
